lines.text: Haven't you enough men at your feet already?
You wouldn't think that anyone could hate a thing and love it too.
You can't love and hate at the same time.
You can! And it's a problem then...

[reading poster]
"Murders being committed in our midst. Police inadequate. We intend offering a substantial reward to anyone, citizen or otherwise, who shall give information bringing the murderer or murderers to justice." Hmm.
He said deep water was restful and full of peace. The river drew him even in the end.
A river sweeps a city clean.
Carries things out to sea. And they sink in deep water.
If it was him, I'm glad.
Whitechapel was swarming with police and you haven't come near to laying a hand on him!
I'll make Jack the Ripper's own fingers tie the noose that will hang him!
It's such lovely women as you who drag men down!
